tool_description:
Are you looking for a way to add some astrological flair to your app or website? Do you want to offer your users personalized horoscopes, zodiac compatibility, numerology, tarot readings, and more? If so, you have come to the right place!

Horostory is the leading Horoscope API that delivers accurate and engaging zodiac and astrology content. Whether you need daily, weekly, or monthly horoscopes, or detailed astrological calculations and interpretations, Horostory has it all.
name: Horostory
title: Horostory

api_list.name: planetaryoverview
api_list.description: get the Planetary Overview of the day
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://horostory.p.rapidapi.com/planetaryoverview"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horostory.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://horostory.p.rapidapi.com/planetaryoverview"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horostory.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: hoscoscope
api_list.description: retrieve the horoscope for a specific sign and date
